description: Architecting and developing scalable, high-performance applications, ensuring best practices in system design, security, and maintainability.
Building and maintaining robust, full-stack solutions using React, Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS, optimizing both front-end and back-end performance.
Enhancing system stability and reliability by proactively monitoring, diagnosing, and resolving bottlenecks to support high availability.
Implementing automated testing (unit, integration, and E2E) to maintain high code coverage and minimize production regressions.
Driving DevOps best practices, improving CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and deployment strategies.
Leading and participating in code reviews, ensuring high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions.
Improving and refactoring existing code, reducing technical debt while optimizing performance and efficiency.
Collaborating cross-functionally with product managers, UX designers, and stakeholders to align technical implementations with business goals.
Providing mentorship and leadership, supporting junior developers and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation.
Engineered and deployed microservices using NestJs and Typescript, with a primary focus on enhancing backend scalability, efficiency, and performance.
Architected and developed a user-centric PoC mobile app with React Native.
Implemented responsive front-end interfaces with VueJs, improving user satisfaction.
Designed and optimized databases for efficient data storage and retrieval, implementing a tailored indexing strategy, resulting in a 30% decrease in query execution times.
Dockerized the app microservices for local development, reducing onboarding process overhead & setup times.
Ensured HIPAA compliance by working with Smile CDR and adhering to FHIR standards.

Engineered efficient and scalable microservices using Node.js and Typescript, adhering to the principles of hexagonal architecture. By decoupling components and emphasizing modularity, the architecture facilitated flexibility and maintainability while ensuring optimal performance and scalability.
Automated testing processes with Cypress, resulting in a reduction in testing time and improved product quality.
Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins-Docker-Portainer, streamlining deployment processes and reducing deployment time.
Continuously enhanced the user experience and functionality of a React Native App through iterative development cycles. Addressed user feedback and implemented feature improvements iteratively.
Built a robust and efficient API with Node Js, facilitating seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.

Developed a serverless Python-based Bot to automate repetitive tasks, significantly reducing manual workload by 100% leveraging Google Cloud Platform with Cloud Scheduler triggering one Cloud Function queryin Cloud SQL.
